question: Which is the country of origin of the festival music "Rara"?
explanation: Haiti is the country of origin of the festival music "Rara". Rara is a form of festival music that originated in Haiti that is used for street processions, typically during Easter Week. The music centres on a set of cylindrical bamboo trumpets called vaccine but also features drums, maracas, g√ºiras or guiros (a percussion instrument), and metal bells, as well as alsos which are made from recycled metal, often coffee cans.
